Package maldiniPaone.databaseConnection.interfaces

Interface ManageDataAccess

All Known Implementing Classes:
DataAccessFacade
public interface ManageDataAccess
This interface provides all the methods to retrieve, save, modify and delete data provided by the maldiniPaone.databaseConnection package

  • Method Details

    • getReportsMadeBy

      java.util.List<Report> getReportsMadeBy​(java.lang.String username) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets reports made by a user
      Parameters:
      username - : user name of the user whose reports are being retrieved
      Returns:
      List of Reports : the list of reports made by the user
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - if database connection is unsuccessful
      IllegalParameterException - if the methods are called on not valid methods

    • getAccidents

      java.util.List<Accident> getAccidents​(Location location) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets the list of accidents close to a given location
      Parameters:
      location - the location where accidents must be searched
      Returns:
      List of Accidents the list of accidents found in the area
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - if database connection is unsuccessful
      IllegalParameterException - if the methods are called on not valid methods

      location - the location to which respect the reports are searched
      Returns:
      Integer the amount of reports
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - if database connection is unsuccessful

    • getCityHall

      CityHall getCityHall​(java.lang.String username) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets the CityHall where a municipality works
      Parameters:
      username - the user name of the municipality whose CityHall is being searched
      Returns:
      the closest CityHall if any close enough , null otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • findUsernameByEmail

      java.lang.String findUsernameByEmail​(java.lang.String email) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets the user name of a User given his/her email
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the searched user
      Returns:
      String containing the user name of the searched user, empty string if no user was found
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

      Returns:

      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • getViolations

      java.util.List<Violation> getViolations​(CityHall cityHall) throws IllegalParameterException, ServerSideDatabaseException
      gets the list of the violation associated to a given city hall
      Parameters:
      cityHall - the cityhall to which respect the violations are searched
      Returns:
      List of violations associated to the cityhall
      Throws:
      IllegalParameterException - when violation type is not supported
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when database can't be found

      password - the password of the citizen to be added
      email - the email of the citizen to be added
      Returns:
      true if the creation is successful , false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

      true if the creation is successful , false otherwise
      Throws:

      Adds a Authority to the service
      Parameters:
      username - the user name of the Authority to be added
      password - the password of the Authority to be added
      email - the email of the Authority to be added
      creatorUsername - the username of the municipality who adds the authority
      district - the district where the authority works
      Returns:
      true if the creation is successful , false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • addMunicipality

      boolean addMunicipality​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creatorUsername, CityHall cityHall) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Adds a Municipality to the service
      Parameters:
      username - the user name of the Municipality to be added
      password - the password of the Municipality to be added
      email - the email of the Municipality to be added
      creatorUsername - the username of the municipality who adds the municipality
      cityHall - the CityHall to which the municipality is associated
      Returns:
      true if the creation is successful , false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • addMunicipalityAndCityHall

      boolean addMunicipalityAndCityHall​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creatorUsername, CityHall cityHall) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Adds a Municipality to the service
      Parameters:
      username - the user name of the Municipality to be added
      password - the password of the Municipality to be added
      email - the email of the Municipality to be added
      creatorUsername - the username of the manager who adds the municipality
      cityHall - the CityHall to which the municipality is associated and must be created
      Returns:
      true if the creation is successful , false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • addSuggestion

      boolean addSuggestion​(java.lang.String suggestion, CityHall cityHall) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Adds a suggestion to a CityHall
      Parameters:
      suggestion - the suggestion content
      cityHall - the CityHall to which the suggestion must be associated
      Returns:
      true if the creation is successful , false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • modifyUser

      boolean modifyUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, UserType user, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String newUsername, java.lang.String newPassword) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Modify User credentials
      Parameters:
      username - the old username of the user
      password - the old password of the user
      user - the UserType of the user
      email - the new email address of the user
      newUsername - the new username of the User
      newPassword - the new password of the user
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful , false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • updateAssignment

      boolean updateAssignment​(java.lang.Integer assignmentId, State state, java.lang.String username, ViolationType type) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Modify Assignment state
      Parameters:
      assignmentId - the id of the assignment to be modified
      state - the new state of the assignment
      username - the username of the user who is modifying the state
      type - the ViolationType of the assignment
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful , false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • forgotPassword

      boolean forgotPassword​(java.lang.String oldUsername, UserType user, java.lang.String newPassword) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Modify Account when forgot old password
      Parameters:
      oldUsername - : the old user name of the user to be modified
      user - : the type of the user that must be modified
      newPassword - : the new password to be set
      Returns:
      boolean : true if the update is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • removeUser

      boolean removeUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, UserType user) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Delete a user
      Parameters:
      username - the old username of the user
      password - the old password of the user
      user - the UserType of the user
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is successful , false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)
